content.rendered:
Garekars MD
Facials

At Garekars M.D. we have collaborated with US based REPECHAGE to bring you a wide range of facials which are tailor made to address the requirements of various skin types.

We work with you to develop customised facial plan that takes into account your skin condition, health and personal goals.

Get appointment

Call us

9667684409

AGE DEFYING FACIAL

FOUR LAYER FACIAL:

“The best facial of the century” – Cosmopolitan UK

A seaweed based facial. The rich blend of vitamins, minerals, anti-oxidants and amino acids in sea weed makes it the ideal main ingredient for de-toxifying, oxygenating, anti-aging and hydrating benefits.

The cool seaweed mask is followed by a mineral rich thermal mask that allows for total relaxation and immediate results. Skin is cleaner, healthier and younger looking.

PUMPKIN PEEL FACIAL

This power facio-peel combines the benefit of both peeling and facial. This luxurious sixty minutes service is ideal for de-tanning, deep hydration and skin brightening. It contains natural pumpkin extracts which are packed with fruit enzymes, AHAs, vitamin A and vitamin C. These organic extracts not only increase cell turnover to brighten and smooth the skin but also boost collagen production to prevent signs of aging.

FOR ACNE PRONE SKIN

HYDRA MEDIC ACNE FACIAL:

“A no massage facial with therapeutic ingredients like Salicylic acid, Chamomile and tea tree extract designed to effectively target breakouts specifically for acne prone skin.

It purifies and controls existing breakouts while helping to prevent new ones from forming. Reduces oil from overly active sebaceous glands while maintaining skin moisture balance. This pure and refining treatment allows cleansing deep down while soothing and healing lesions, leaving skin with renewed freshness and purity.

FOR BRIGHTENING

BIOLIGHT MIRACLE FACIAL with GLYCO-SEA PEEL:

A multidimensional approach to skin brightening and even toning. Clinically proven Hexapeptide is combined with natural extracts from Daisy & Licorice to help interrupt melanogenesis before, during and after color formation. Powerful anti-oxidants, natural botanicals and unique sea-weed plants work to give skin a glowing radiant complexion.

The revolutionary Glyco-Sea peel is a deep intensive skin treatment that focuses on resurfacing and renewing skin with less irritation than standard glycolic peels. This unique combination uncovers a luminosity you thought gone forever.

ORGANIC PUMPKIN PEEL FACIAL

This power facio-peel combines the benefit of both peeling and facial. This luxurious sixty minutes service is ideal for de-tanning, deep hydration and skin brightening. It contains natural pumpkin extracts which are packed with fruit enzymes, AHAs, vitamin A and vitamin C. These organic extracts not only increase cell turnover to brighten and smooth the skin but also boost collagen production to prevent signs of aging.

FOR SENSITIVE SKIN

RED-OUT FACIAL

The one of a kind facial for Rosacea and Hypersensitive skin.

This facial with micro-silver and anti-oxidants contains proprietary eco-cert-seaweeds as well as other anti-inflammatory ingredients to calm the redness and inflammation of a sensitive skin.
